question: Name
Address of the Applicant
Name and Address of the agent if any
Name of Agent
Address of the Agent if any
Premises where the lift is to be erected
Whether a license has been previously issued (details to be given)
Type of the Lifts proposed to be erected (a sketch of the lift and erection plan should be attached
Name and address of firm installing lift
Type of the lift proposed to be erected
Rated maximum speed of the lift
The makers/designer rated capacity in weight
Total weight of the lift cage
Maximum number of passengers
Weight of counterweight
Number & description, weight and size of the supporting cable
Depth of pit from the lowest part of the lift cage at the lowest floor
Top and bottom clearance
Details of construction of the overhead arrangement with the weight and size of the beam
Number of stops/opening giving details of basement(if any)
Name and contact no. of the person to be contacted at the time of inspection
